full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement** [EN/FR]
==========

### Project Details
* **Project Number** : GB16112_82088
* **Title** : Rehabilitate Runway 15-33 & Reconstruct Taxiways, 5 Wing GB, NL (Réfection de la piste 15-33 et reconstruction des voies de circulation, 5 Wing GB, T.-N.-L.)
* **Expected Contract Start Date** : 2025-04-09
* **Expected Contract End Date** : 2025-04-09

### Tender Overview
The Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is soliciting bids for the rehabilitation of Runway 15-33 and reconstruction of Taxiways Foxtrot and Papa at 5 Wing Goose Bay, Newfoundland and Labrador. The scope of work includes:

* Rehabilitation of Runway 15-33
* Reconstruction of Taxiways Foxtrot and Papa
* Removal of existing asphalt pavement full depth
* Excavation and stockpiling of soil and gravel
* Supply and placement of new granular subbase
* Supply and placement of new asphalt
* Installation of traffic control markings
* Other necessary work to complete the project

### Important Dates
* **Publication Date** : 2024-02-29
* **Tender Closing Date** : 2024-04-09T13:00:00
* **Amendment Date** : 2024-04-09

### Contract Requirements
The successful bidder must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS), issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP) within Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC). The selected contractor will be required to comply with the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA).

### Bidding Information
Bidders can obtain contract award results from the DCC website and deposit their bids on http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply; see https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.
